reference: Harberger, Arnold C., Interview with Arnold Harberger: Sound Policies Can Free Up Natural Forces of Growth, IMF Survey, International Monetary Fund, Washington, DC, July 14, 2003, 213-216. Friedman, Eric, Simon Johnson, Daniel Kaufmann, and Pablo Zoido-Lobaton, Dodging the Grabbing Hand: The Determinants of Unofficial Activity in 69 Countries, Journal of Public Economics, June 2000.
Caballero, Ricardo J., and Mohammed L. Hammour, Creative Destruction and Development: Institutions, Crises, and Restructuring, NBER Working Paper No. 7849, August 2000.
Acemoglu, Daron, Phillipe Aghion, and Fabrizio Zilibotti, Distance to Frontier, Selection, and Economic Growth, NBER Working Paper No. 9066, July 2002.
